msgSnippet: Take a look at BS 7925-1 Vocabulary of terms in software testing (http://www.testingstandards.co.uk/bs_7925-1.htm) Steven Hale Chappell, Simon P
messageBody:

(http://www.testingstandards.co.uk/bs_7925-1.htm)

P"

2004-10-12 21:47 Kopia

Ärende
Sänd svar till [junit] Definitions question
junit@yahoogroups
.com









We're having some "robust" discussions about testing here and one of the
big issues concerns correct nomenclature for testing types and levels and
scopes. Does anyone have any book recommendations to help with industry
accepted terms and definitions? I have seen references to "The Art of
Software Testing" by Glenford Myers that describe it as the seminal work on
the matter. Is that book worth getting? Is there a website anywhere that
has "standard" definitions that my co-workers and I can use for
enlightenment on this matter?

All wisdom on this matter will be greatly appreciated.

Simon
